name: eG Innovations
tag_list: virtualization, monitoring, management, vmware, citrix, business-service-monitoring, cloud-monitoring, managed-services
overview:
eG Innovations delivers enterprise-class monitoring solutions that customers use our solutions to monitor their critical IT services end-to-end and to perform proactive triage for rapid problem isolation and diagnosis.

eG Innovations, Inc. (http://www.eginnovations.com) is a global provider of performance monitoring and triage solutions for both virtual and physical IT infrastructures. The companyâ€™s patented technologies provide proactive monitoring of every layer of every tier in the infrastructure, thereby enabling rapid diagnosis and recovery in enterprise and service provider networks. By ensuring high availability and optimum performance of mission-critical business services, eG Innovationsâ€™ solutions help enhance customersâ€™ competitive positioning, lower operational costs and optimize the performance of their infrastructures. With support for monitoring 120+ applications, 10 operating systems, and 7 virtualization platforms, eG Innovations offers broad infrastructure coverage that customers in different domains - finance, healthcare, government, legal, and service providers find essential.

eG Innovations has won several awards for its flagship eG Enterprise product suite. Its virtualization monitoring solution, the eG VM Monitor won the Best of VMworld award in the infrastructure and application management category at VMworld 2008, and its Citrix and Terminal Services monitoring solution was the best rated solution by MSTerminalServices.org in 2007. Gartner rated eG Innovations as one of its Cool Vendors in IT Operations and Management in 2010. eG Enterprise is also the only monitoring solution in the industry that is certified to be both VMware Ready and Citrix Ready.
